import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, faNpm, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) return ( <>

I am Qeshm. A student from School of Science and Technology Singapore. I specialise in front end web development and have done many projects. Some of which will be put up on this site soon.

I'm interested in web development projects.

I am confident in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React.js, and THREE.js (A 3D Javascript Library)

) } export default About
